original_title: CEAT Kelani recognised once again at National Business Excellence Awards 2025
original_body_lines: CEAT Kelani Holdings, Sri Lanka’s leading manufacturer of pneumatic tyres and the company behind the country’s highest-selling tyre brand CEAT, has once again been recognised for business excellence, emerging as Joint Runner-Up in the ‘Manufacturing – Other Sector’ category at the National Business Excellence Awards (NBEA) 2025.

Competing in the Extra-Large category for enterprises with annual revenue exceeding Rs 10 billion, CEAT Kelani’s performance at this year’s competition reaffirms its standing as one of Sri Lanka’s most professionally and efficiently managed businesses.

Now in its 20th year, the NBEA is the flagship awards programme of the National Chamber of Commerce of Sri Lanka, which celebrates outstanding business achievements and promotes global standards of excellence across the country’s corporate landscape. CEAT’s continued success at this prestigious competition underscores the company’s commitment to organisational excellence and its contribution to the national economy.

The evaluation criteria for the awards covered seven pillars of excellence: Strategy & Leadership, Corporate Governance, Capacity Building, Performance Management, Local and Global Market Reach, CSR and Environmental Sustainability, and Business & Financial Results.

CEAT’s submission highlighted its integrated Quality-Based Management (QBM) system, a proprietary Total Quality Management (TQM) framework which instils a culture of continuous improvement. The company’s QBM philosophy is built around Customer Focus, People Focus, and Process Focus, ensuring that every employee contributes towards the achievement of business goals and delivery of superior value.
